message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $11,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
